awards.text: Nominated for 1 Primetime Emmy. Another 4 wins & 5 nominations.

fullplot: Young Pip is expected to become a blacksmith, but, hating the soot and smoke, he secretly dreams of becoming a gentleman. When he meets the mysterious Miss Havisham and her haughty niece Estella, Pip is confident that his dream is to come true.

title: Great Expectations
